reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be of high quality and appreciate its warmth, with one noting it's perfect for New York weather. They describe it as gorgeous and soft, with a zipper pull that makes it easy to wear. The comfort receives mixed feedback, with some finding it cozy while others say it's itchy. The color also gets mixed reviews, with one customer describing it as gentle and earthy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best, high quality sweater, as always
items.body: I always love Irish wool sweaters (Aran sweaters), and this is one of them I have bought from the stores/manufactures in Ireland. This hooded cardigan is a medium weight, very very pretty, soft, warm, and well made product. I am 5'9" , slim to medium built. The medium size fits perfectly, including the sleeve length. It also fits comfortably, not loose but not too tight. The color is gentle and earthy. This is perfect for New York weather, especially now we have to sit outdoor for a dinner because of the Covid situation indoor dinning is prohibited. This sweater will keep you warm so you can enjoy your meal. In summary, this is a beautiful sweater, I love it, as I love the people and the land of Ireland! If the products get replenished, I would like to get an army green one, too. Read more
items.author: xw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, looks great and fits well
items.body: Fantastic sweater, got the green size L, sleeves are not quite long enough for my 5'9" arms - fits perfectly otherwise, not snug ( I usually wear a medium in tops, size 10, but sizes vary depending on brand). Beautiful to look at, great pattern detail, looks like quality - also comfortable, and the zipper makes it so easy to wear. Great layered, doesn't seem itchy (although I wear long sleeves under it). Love the pockets and the hood. Feels cozy, looks nicer than most fleece and sweaters. I've returned it only because I wish it were an inch longer for my arms. Read more
items.author: MER

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm and beautiful!
items.body: Love the rich, deep green color! The honeycomb weave makes this sweater especially attractive and well worth the price. This quality sweater is my new favorite, one gorgeous sweater I will enjoy wearing for years! Read more
items.author: 14Missie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The color is more beige than cream.
items.body: I misunderstood the color from the picture. It's one of those beiges that comes close to pink. It has gold and blue flecks, but few and far between, hard to notice. The distance from underarm to hem is 18 inches, longer than I thought. It covers my hips. Shaped like a jacket more than a cardigan. At first I almost returned it because I wanted cream color. But it goes well with chocolate brown and black and denim, and it's very warm and excellent quality. I'm sure I will enjoy it for many years! Read more
items.author: Jane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning and warm!
items.body: I bought this as a knod to my heritage for St. Patrick’s Day. Sometimes when sweaters come from Ireland they run smaller than our sizes. I bought an extra small and it is absolutely perfect! Although I initially thought the color was a bit dark (moss green) for me when you wear it, it is absolutely beautiful! It looks standing on! The quality is unbelievable! Read more
items.author: TK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater
items.body: This sweater is well made, very flattering fit. I am 5’5” and 130lbs and the medium fits well. The zipper pull is also a nice touch. Very pretty and have already gotten compliments Read more
items.author: Ashley W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very warm and pretty!
items.body: Tad itchy but so warm and cozy Read more
items.author: tlakwm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft wool, warm and breathable.
items.body: This woolen sweater has a great quality - comfortable material as well as the measurements of the style. You can feel European touch of “traditions” and it’s understanding of quality products. Read more
items.author: Sega

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Army Green, Oatmeal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
